snippet: The average of 111.9 million viewers made Super Bowl 50 the third-most-watched television program in United States history.
abstract: NFL Roundup; broadcast of 2016 Super Bowl fails to set viewership records; draws average of 111.9 million viewers, making it third-most-watched television program in United States history, just behind two previous Super Bowls; other football news noted.
lead_paragraph: The average of 111.9 million viewers made Super Bowl 50 the third-most-watched television program in United States history.

headline.main: Viewership of Super Bowl Falls Short of Record
